Document: # Rule 1.3 Do not communicate in-round information to other people. - This includes discussing the current round in our Discord server, this includes even mundane comments such as “Hey I'm a chef, who wants to be a botanist?” - Exceptions do apply if you are asking for help, as long as you keep revealed information to a minimum. - Do not stream content from Nebulous Stories on Twitch, Youtube, or other social media sites.
